title: Sales for this month?
body:
Is there anywhere I can find the sales for this month
(Skins and Heros)
Also any other sort of sales would be good to know about aswell if possible.

I'm maing this because Ive done it previously and was informed of soon to be sales.

replies.body:
they haven't done that for like 3 months. Riot said it "took the surprise of seeing a champ/skin you wanted appear on sale".

Translated: people spent less money when they were informed of the sales ahead of time.

Snowdown is coming soon, so get ready for some christmas related skins and sales.
